author: Charles Ventura
description: If Trump "took a dump on his desk, you would defend it,” the CNN host told Lord.
title: Anderson Cooper 'genuinely sorry' for 'crude' remark directed at Jeffrey Lord

description: CNN anchor Anderson Cooper says he regrets making a "crude" and "unprofessional" remark about President Trump to Jeffrey Lord on-air Friday.

title: What's actually going on in this picture of Trump touching a glowing orb?
